job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p>Job Title: Software Engineer 5</p><p>Location: Mountain View, CA (100% Remote is an option for this role as long as the candidate can work PST time zone)</p><p>Role: Full Time</p><p><br></p><p>Job Responsibilities</p><p>Requirements:</p><p>• 6+ years of professional experience as a Sr. Software Engineer</p><p>• 4+ years of solid experience in Ruby on Rails with experience in libraries like Resque and RSpec</p><p>• Experience with GrapQL is a big plus</p><p>• Experience in ReactJS/Redux JavaScript frameworks, Ad experience a plus</p><p>• Experience in JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, and other core web technologies</p><p>• Experience in consuming REST APIs in JavaScript/NodeJS</p><p>• Experience in SCM Source Code Management systems and tools, such as GIT</p><p>• Strong knowledge in Computer Science foundations</p><p>• BS/MS in Computer Science/Engineering or equivalent experience</p>
